text: I called it a hidden gem near one-north. Food is above average and a good selection of menu to choose from. I had the big breakfast and the portion is enough for 2 small eaters. Coffee is aromatic and smooth. Nice muffins too.

Came here for lunch on a weekday. Ordered the grilled chicken pesto linguine not bad though slightly pricey at $19. Has the standard cafe offerings - brunch options (available during lunch), pasta, steak and salmon. Limited seating area so do come early. Also itâ€™s halal so great for gatherings with colleagues

Well worth 5 Stars!
Great coffees: we had Cappuccinos - be sure to ask for large. We had the regular blend which was smooth, bitter-free and no need for sugar.
Breakfast - opted for the Avo Smash without egg - easily the best breakfast I've had this month. The textures compliment the food, and the taste - OMG so good! Delicious tang with the Avo Smash, smooth sweet white onions and ?chili oil on top ðŸ‘Œ
Thank you! Will be back for sure!

Our go to place to have halal brunch. The outlet we always frequent is the one at Fusionopolis.
The coffee blend changes on a monthly basis, so u get to try different blends. And so far, their blends never fail.
Food is good though. Generous portions.
Staff are super friendly and helpful.

Edit: portion and service seems better on my second visit.

Salmon is a little overpriced for the size, although taste was fine. Coffee was so so, not strong enough. I've had better coffee in nearby cafes.
